title: Draw Master 3D
description: Draw Master 3D is New Draw Puzzle Game , Draw Missing part and Make action Have Fun . Draw Any One part in Scene Move the Object characters Many more . Best Brain Puzzle Game with Draw Puzzle .
instructions: Mouse Only

title: Just Draw
description: Just Draw is an interesting education painting game. It is very useful to open kids' minds. Just draw the lost part of the picture. Is it very easy? Come on to play! It will test your routine knowledge. So observe the things you usually see, it will help you.
instructions: slide to draw

title: Paper Planes
description: This is the game to train your focus and hand eye coordination. Swipe in direction of the middle plane. Score as many points within 60 seconds. Track your daily and weekly score.
instructions: Swipe in direction of the plane

title: Tangle Master 3D
description: Look at this mess of wires! You decide to put them back together. Successfully separate the tangled wires. Do not pull out two plugs at the same time, and do not plug in two plugs at the same time. What are you going to do about it?
instructions: Tap to play.

title: Amazing Colors
description: Swipe to paint in each direction. Color the floors with the least amount of moves. Can you beat your own high score? Painting has never been this fun!
instructions: Paint the floors with the least amount of moves

title: Drop The Apple Into Mouth
description: You have to drop the apple into mouth of hungry monster. if you miss you will loose. This is endless game. you can collect more score and break the hi-score. Enjoy!
instructions: Tap on the screen or press space bar on the keyboard or shoulder keys on game pad.

title: Neko Pachinko
description: Have a taste of Japanese culture with this funny and cute game! Launch your balls in the board and set their power turning the wheel at the bottom. Your aim is to throw as many balls as possible inside the lucky holes to enter the bonus game, where, if you get three identical symbols, you'll win a prize! (Please note this game is meant to be used for fun, no real prizes will be provided)
instructions: Turn the wheel to set ball direction

title: Cube Run
description: Cube Run this is a fun game that will allow you to have fun. In this game, you need to collect as many cubes as possible. you will need your dexterity and care. Very cool game, interesting pastime provided.
instructions: Mouse Only

title: Bullet Bender Online
description: Bullet Bender Online is a special arcade game. You could experience the classic scene in the movie Wanted. Bend bullet! But this time you are not an assassin, you are a policeman. Control the track of the bullet, kill all the enemies, protect the hostage.
instructions: Slide to control

title: Kart Jigsaw
description: Kart Jigsaw is a fun online puzzle game. Drag the pieces into right position using mouse. Solving puzzles is relaxing, rewarding, and keeps your brain sharp. You need to spend $1000 to be able to purchase one of the following pictures. You have three modes for each picture from which the hardest mode brings more money. You have a total of 6 pictures.
instructions: Use mouse or touch the screen!

title: Asian Mystery
description: This is interesting classical tick tack toe game in this summer hot days. This game prefer to force the brain to work round the clock, and our game Asian Mystery is just right for this. We suggest you to fight in colorful crosses of zeros on a golden sand field, divided into squares. Defeat the virtual opponent in any of the selected modes: simple or complex. Collect victory points and enjoy your own mental superiority over the computer's electronic brains. Heave Fun!
instructions: Use your mouse to play the game or tap on the screen!

title: Protect Red Indian Man
description: Protect red indian man from the shooting fire by moving left and right. When you escape from fire you can have score and try to get more score. Enjoy!
instructions: Touch left and right on the screen or left and right keys on keyboard or left and right shoulder keys on game pad.

title: Skincare Crush
description: Skincare Crush, hey girls let's show everyone that we can play games while skincare. Pretty girls never neglect skincare. Find and match the same pictures, get the highest score. Use your time correctly, pass all levels. May all the stars be yours.
instructions: Left Click and Touch

title: Blow Up Jellies
description: Play with jellies. you have to catch and hold the jellies until blow up and collect score and collect the coins faster you can. when missed the 3 jellies, game will over. Enjoy!
instructions: KEEP TOUCHING ON JELLIES UNTIL BLOW UP.

title: Desafio gamer 2
description: The sequel to the most irritating challenge on the internet. Survive as long as you can to collect coins and buy skins. With tactic support for mobile devices and mouse control for computers. Don't let Viki end the fun with her phrases. Keep trying, luck
instructions: Touch control for mobile devices and mouse control for computers

title: MathPup Truck Counting
description: A simple driving math game where you'll need to drop the target amount of items in your truck and deliver them. A fun way to practice your counting skills. Untimed so you can take your time but you'll have to go fast enough to climb the small hills while not letting your items bounce out.
instructions: Use the on-screen buttons to go forward and reverse. Use the tilt forward or tilt backward buttons to keep the truck stable over bumps. You can also use the arrow or WASD keys on a keyboard.

title: Swing Goblin
description: A fun and addictive casual game. Swing your goblin as far as possible. Many cute characters and nice background images. Simple to control but very challenging. PLAY NOW!
instructions: Tap at the right time to swing your goblin.

title: Asmr Slicing
description: ASMR Slicing is a simple app game. Do you like Fruit Ninja game? You could continue to experience slicing fruit, but the rule is different. There are some big fruits on the platform, you have to break them into pieces. Those pieces will drop off under gravity. Eventually, they will drop into a blender, you can get a tasty juice!
instructions: slide to slice

title: Moto Rush
description: Try to get a high score by racing your moto bike for as long as possible. Jump over ramps, get speed boosts and try not to crash for as long as possible in this fun 3D high score game.
instructions: Tap and hold to drive and to flip

title: Eat Small Fishes
description: You have to escape from big fish and eat small fish. tap on the screen to move the player fish. collect points as you can. when collide a big fish then game over. Enjoy!
instructions: Tap on the screen to move player fish.

title: Fortune Cookies
description: A fortune cookie is a crisp and sugary cookie usually made from flour, sugar, vanilla, and sesame seed oil with a piece of paper inside. Fortune Cookies is a fantastic cooking game with amazing graphics and customization. Play Fortune Cookies now to bake your favorite food!

title: Tenkyu Hole 3d rolling ball
description: Roll the ball through a 3D world to reach the goal! Carefully maneuver through stages, or meet your doom!.Swipe your finger and tilt the stage and roll the ball. Be careful not to tilt too much! Game over if the ball falls!

title: Move Balloon Safely
description: Moves balloon left and right and let it go to top or end without colliding wooden spikes. This game is fun to play and try to complete the level. Enjoy!

title: Press the Longest Stick
description: This game's rule is very simple, find out the longest stick and click (tap) it.The game has time limit so you need to find the target stick fast and correct. There are 2 difficulty in the game, normal mode and hard mode, the time limit of normal mode is longer than hard mode. If you think you are very good at this game, let's challenge hard mode! And there are many interesting titles you can get.
instructions: Very simple. Find the longest stick and click (tap) it.

title: Flying Robot
description: MOVE THE ROBOT WITH TOUCHING LEFT AND RIGHT BUTTONS OR KEYBOARD LEFT AND RIGHT ARROWS OR GAME PAD (SHOULDER BUTTONS). YOU CAN NOT USE TWO BUTTONS AT SAME TIME. AND FIND THE SHIP TO END THE GAME.

Tap and the machine will crush them, I have to say it is a good way to relieve pressure. But pay attention to avoid the bomb and modulator tube. Play this game!

title: Wizard Vs Orcs
description: A flock of orcs are coming. The safety of the magical kingdom is at stake. You are a powerful wizard, use your magic to defeat the orcs to protect your magical kingdom. 36 levels to play! Enjoy!

title: Create Challenge Text Fast
description: You can create "CHALLENGE" text fats by dragging and dropping the letters in correct order before time out. You have to be speed to make this text. Enjoy!

title: Super Color Lines
description: Play the game Super Color Lines and test your intelligence. In the game, in front of your screen, the playing field will be visible divided into an equal number of cells. In some of the cells square chips of different colors will be visible. You have to carefully place one line in five objects from the chips of the same color. Moving of the objects is by clicking on the selected item and move to the location you specified. As soon as the line is set with 5 objects will disappear from the screen and points will be awarded to you.Heave fun!
instructions: Use your mouse to play the game or tap on the screen!

title: Pizza Maker My Pizzeria
description: Pizza Maker: My Pizzeria Game is the ideal fast food cooking game in which you can make pizza for your customers! Take every “pizza order call”, make and sell pizza and get a review from the customers. Make sure not to disappoint them, follow the recipe carefully and deliver pizza on time!
instructions: Mouse Only

title: Fishing Boy
description: Fishing Boy is a very popular game about fishing! You in it to fight for its prey, fish, blow rabid sharks, sea horses, collect starfish, seashells, catch bubbles with bombs, worms, treasure, watches and gifts! You have to collect everything in this game as possible as you can! Dial your top score and be top player in this sea battle! Tap on the buttons or arrow keys to move and fishing.
instructions: Use the left and right arrow keys to move, down arrow key to catch fish, spacebar to bomb or tap on-screen buttons.

title: Super Escape Masters
description: Escape with your friends from prison and enjoy the amazing adventure underground. Dig the right way out, sort many obstacles to enojoy your freedom. Complete 24 exciting levels avoid spikes, boxes, explosives, water, and the guards to reach the truck and leave the place. Save many friends as you can and collect gold and keys to complete all the levels to the max in this amazing and frantic escape. Don't let youb friends behind and run for your life.
instructions: Mouse or Touch for Play

title: Alphabet Memory Game
description: One of the best ways to teach something to children is using some kind of game. This memory game is aimed to teach children the English alphabets using a memory game. This game has 4 modes: Learning, Easy, Normal and Hard. In learning, you will see all alphabets and you can choose each one to hear its pronunciation. In other modes, you can play a memory game and you have to match all cards to finish the level.
instructions: Use mouse or touch the screen!

title: Stack Ball 3
description: This is the version 3 of Stack Ball games, Play this awesome game. Can you take the ball to break all the the bricks and go to the bottom? Let try this game now!
instructions: Click to make the ball fall down

title: Where is my ruffled bird
description: Use your mouse/finger to draw lines to lead the ruffled bird rolling into the hole. Collect coins to unlock new ruffled birds. There are 40 levels to play. Enjoy!
instructions: Use mouse/finger to draw lines.

title: Tetris Mobile
description: Tetris Mobile is actually another free Tetris game. In the game you need to make as many horizontal lines and score points as much as possible. Use the arrow keys to adjust the situation of falling blocks, and use up to change the form to matching the proper corner. Have Fun.
instructions: Use your key arrows to play the game or tap on the screen!

title: Cute Kitty Car Jigsaw
description: Let's play our new jigsaw puzzle game called Cute Kitty Car Jigsaw. You can select one of the six images and then select one of the three modes: easy with 25 pieces, medium with 49 pieces and hard with 100 pieces. Have fun and enjoy!
instructions: Use mouse or touch the screen!

title: Flappy Rocket
description: This game is same like flappy bird game. There is a rocket in this game and this is space game. you have to escape from planets and collect coins. this game is endless. Enjoy!
instructions: Touch on the button or use keyboard "space button" or game pad.

title: Word Cross Jungle
description: Want to become a trivia master? Solve crosswords and explore beautiful sceneries, use your knowledge and skills in a one-of-a-kind word game. Innovative gameplay that brings a new twist to crossword puzzles.
instructions: Find all the words

title: Popcorn Show
description: Popcorn Shop is a Hypercausal puzzle game!Keep the barrel full of popcorn. Don't discard anything and get the highest score! The popcorn cup is sad because it's empty. Your job is to draw a line, fill the popcorn cup with popcorn, and smile again! Thousands of unique levels can be played with ease and fun using simple rules, but can be challenging.
instructions: Game played with MOUSE!

title: Circus Dart Wheel
description: In this game, you are a circus artist, your task is to throw Darts at the target, and do not harm the poor guy. The closer you get to the center, the more points you get. This game will help you to distract and relax.The game is bright and interesting.
instructions: Mouse Games

title: Falling Bricks
description: In the new exciting game Falling Bricks, you can test your reaction speed and agility. A black block will be located on the playing field below. You can move it right or left using the control keys. From above, blocks between which you will see passages will fall at different speeds. You will need to do so that your block would slip between objects through these passages. The longer you last doing these actions, the more points you get.
instructions: Use your mouse to play the game or tap on the screen!

title: True or False Challenge
description: True or False Challenge is a brain teasing trivia quiz game. In this game, you need to decide whether the statements are true or false. There are many different categories of questions. Test your brain right now!
instructions: Use mouse or touch the screen!

title: Amass The Boxes Game
description: Drop the boxes and build up it you can and collect the score. When fall the box or boxes then will game over and explosion will happened. This is an endless game. Enjoy!
instructions: tap/click on the moving box

title: Homescapes
description: It is an adventure puzzle game. The lover of middle-age man has been robbered, she is Imprisoned in a garden with lots of elaborate traps. Choose which doors are open carefully. Every choice will deide your life. Avoid dangerous apparatus, kill the robbers and dogs. Help this poor man to save his lover!
instructions: click to open the gates
